name: Superfruit
overview: A Fruit Machine simulation featuring sound, spinning reels, five row by four column display of fruit, win-line, "bounce" as each reel settles, nudge box, nudge, gambles, two way nudges, swap reels, hold reels, collect win, gamble win, "loser's gamble" if the first gamble is lost, super gamble for the jackpot, and a coin pile that shrinks and grows with your winnings.
